events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application to cover medical expenses and consolidate debt.
The application has been categorized under Personal Loan as it involves medical bills and personal debt consolidation.
Loan officer assigned to conduct further review of the applicant’s financial background and loan requirements.
Initial review completed to assess the eligibility for personal loan based on income, debt, and credit history.
Requested documents include ID proof, recent pay slips, medical bills, and bank statements to verify applicant’s claims.
Applicant submitted all requested documents, including medical invoices and employment records, for further processing.
Credit check completed; applicant has a fair credit score with some existing personal debt reported.
Risk assessment performed indicating manageable risk given applicant’s stable employment and income stream.
Loan offer presented to applicant for personal loan amount at competitive interest rate and flexible repayment terms.
Applicant responded positively and requested clarifications on early repayment options and monthly installment amounts.
Application escalated to senior loan manager for approval due to higher loan amount requested by the applicant.
Loan approved with terms as negotiated, providing sufficient funds to cover medical expenses and debt consolidation.
Funds disbursed to applicant’s bank account, completing the loan funding process for the personal loan.
Follow-up conducted to ensure applicant understands repayment schedule and support options available.
The loan application process is now closed after successful funding and initial customer support follow-up.
